extension.summary: Toggle Piccap ambient backlight on LG WebOS TVs
extension.description:
Controls the Piccap screen capture service on rooted LG WebOS TVs for use with HyperHDR/Hyperion ambient lighting.
Requirements: - Rooted LG WebOS TV with Piccap installed - SSH access enabled on the TV - SSH key authentication configured
Setup: 1. Generate SSH key on your Kodi device: ssh-keygen -t ed25519 2. Copy key to TV: cat ~/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub | ssh root@YOUR_TV_IP "mkdir -p ~/.ssh && cat >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys" 3. Configure TV IP and SSH key path in add-on settings 4. Optional: Map to a remote button via keymap
Keymap example (save to userdata/keymaps/piccap.xml): <keymap><global><remote> <red>RunScript(script.piccap)</red> </remote></global></keymap>
